fullText: Laura Linney gives a performance of such quiet, devastating power that it transforms what might have been a simple monologue into something approaching theatrical transcendence.
dtliExcerpt: Laura Linney gives a performance of such quiet, devastating power that it transforms what might have been a simple monologue into something approaching theatrical transcendence.
